history.proof: intros x' ll' H. hauto lq: on use: app_comm_cons unfold: nat_sorted.

exceptions.tactic: intros l a m b r H0.

original: intros x ll H. unfold nat_sorted in H. intros l a m b r H0. apply H with (l:=a :: l)(a:=b)(m:=m)(b:=a)(r:=r). simpl in H0. injection H0 as H1 H2. rewrite <- H1, <- H2. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
